name: triple-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
short_effect: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.
